text: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar () also abbreviated as TJMM, is a 2023 Indian Hindi- language romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Luv Ranjan and written by Rahul Mody, Luv Ranjan. It is produced by Luv Films and T-Series. Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar started showing in theaters on 8 March 2023. ==Cast== * Ranbir Kapoor as Rohan "Mickey" Arora * Shraddha Kapoor as Nisha "Tinni" Malhotra * Anubhav Singh Bassi as Manu Dabbas * Dimple Kapadia as Renu Arora, Mickey's mother * Boney Kapoor as Ramesh Arora, Mickey's father * Hasleen Kaur as Minny, Mickey's sister * Inayat Verma as Sweetu, Mickey's niece * Monica Chaudhary as Kinchi, Manu's girlfriend * Rajesh Jais as Mr. Malhotra, Tinni's father * Ayesha Raza Mishra as Mrs. Malhotra, Tinni's mother * Kartik Aaryan in a cameo appearance * Nushrat Bharucha in a cameo appearance ==Related pages== *List of Hindi movies of 2023 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2023 movies
title: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar
